name: enterprise-microfrontend
description: 企业级微前端管理后台项目

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter qiankun-main-app dev" "pnpm --filter user-management dev" "pnpm --filter system-management dev"
scripts.build: pnpm --filter qiankun-main-app build && pnpm --filter user-management build && pnpm --filter system-management build
scripts.clean: pnpm --filter qiankun-main-app clean && pnpm --filter user-management clean && pnpm --filter system-management clean
